column2: "Nna Job buaa dɛ
column5: minyim dɛ ɔtse dɛm: Na dasanyi bɛyɛ dɛn atsen wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim?"

column2: "Sɛ ɔpɛ dɛ ɔnye no yiyi ano a
column3: Orunntum mmbua no apem mu kor mpo."

column2: "Ɔyɛ nyansafo wɔ akoma mu
column3: na katakyi wɔ ahoɔdzen mu: Woana na ɔasen no kɔn wɔ no do

column2: "Ɔno na otutu mbepɔw
column3: na wonnyim
column4: Aber a obutuw hɔn wɔ n’ebufuw mu no."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔwosow asaase fi ne sibew
column3: Na n’edum ho popo."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔhyɛ ewia
column3: ma ommpue; Na ɔsosɔw nworaba ano."

column2: "Ɔno nko na ɔtserɛw ɔsor mu
column3: Na otsiatsia po asorɛkye do."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔyɛɛ nworaba Ɔbɔɔ nda esuon
column3: Etsekwagyan

column2: "Ɔno na ɔyɛ ndzɛmba akɛse a ɔtra nhwehwɛmu; Nyew
column3: ndzɛmba nwanwa a wonntum mmbu ano."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔnam me nkyɛn sen
column4: na munnhu no: Otwa mu kɔ so

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: okukur afonam no
column4: woana na ɔbɛsan no ekyir? Woana na obotum ase no dɛ

column2: "Nyankopɔn ronntwe n’ebufuw nnsan; Rahab aboafo brɛ hɔnho adze wɔ n’ase."
"Na burbur ayɛ dɛ emi na mubobua no
column3: Na mibeyiyi me nsɛm dɛ menye no bɛsensan?"

column2: "Ɔno na sɛ metsen mpo a
column3: nkyɛ murummbua no; Mibedzi ntotɔserɛ akyerɛ me tamfo."

column2: "Sɛ mefrɛ na ɔgye me do mpo a; Nkyɛ merenngye nndzi dɛ ɔayɛ aso ama me ndze."
"Osiandɛ ɔdze ehum pusuw me
column3: Na ɔma m’epirakur dɔɔ so ara yie."

column2: "Ɔremma me kwan ma munngu ahom
column3: Na ɔdze bɔwema ahyɛ me ma tɔ."

column2: "Sɛ yɛreka no akatakyi ahoɔdzen do a
column3: hwɛ
column4: ɔwɔ hɔ! Na sɛ atsɛmbu so do a
column5: nkyɛ woana bɛsaman no ama me?"

column2: "Sɛ metsen mpo a
column3: nkyɛ mankasa m’ano bobu me fɔ: Sɛ midzi mu mpo a

column2: "Midzi mu dze
column3: naaso mummbu moho bi

column2: "Ne nyinara kor; dɛm ntsi na mese dɛ
column3: Ɔsɛɛ nyia odzi mu

column2: "Sɛ mpire no ku obi awerɛfirmu a
column3: Osi hɔn a wodzi bem hɔn amandzehu atwetwe."

column2: "Sɛ asaase kedzi nyimpa bɔn no nsamu a: Ɔno Nyankopɔn na ɔkatakata n’atsɛmbuafo enyi; Sɛ ɔnnyɛ ɔno a
column3: nna woana a?"

column2: "Afei me nda ho yɛ har sen mbirikatufo: Wotu kɔ
column3: wonnhu papa biara."

column2: "Wotwa mu kɔ dɛ ndzɛmbir ahɛn: Dɛ korpɔn a ɔtow fa afonam do."
"Sɛ mese dɛ mo werɛ befir m’awerɛhow
column3: Mibegyaa m’enyim botooyɛ

column2: "Me yaw nyinara yɛ me hu
column3: Minyim dɛ irummbu me bem."

column2: "Na sɛ wobobu me fɔ dze a
column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na mebɛberɛ gyan yi?"

column2: "Sɛ medze esukwankyɛba nsu hohor moho
column3: Na meyɛ me nsa ho wansawansa dɛn ara mpo a:"

column2: "Ɔwo edze me bɔto adɛtsebir amona no mu
column3: Na mankasa me ntar mpo bekyir me."

column2: "Na ɔnnyɛ nyimpa dɛ emi
column3: na meebua no

column2: "Hɛn ntamu sɛntwamunyi bi nnyi hɔ a Ɔdze ne nsa bɔto hɛn beenu nyina do."
"Ma onyi n’abaa mfi mo do
column3: Na mma mma no ho hu nnkitsa me:"

column2: "Nna nkyii nkyɛ mebɛkasa
column3: a murunnsuro no; Naaso munnkotum dɛm yɛ wɔ mankasa m’afamu."
